description: This file defines a PaymentsService class that provides a method to process payments for bookings by making HTTP POST requests to a backend API. It uses Dio for HTTP communication and handles exceptions related to Dio errors and other unexpected errors.

classes.name: PaymentsService
classes.description: A service class responsible for handling payment-related API calls, specifically creating payments.

methods.name: createPayment
methods.description: Creates a payment for a specified booking ID with a given amount and method, returning a Payment object upon success.
